name: CSV
description: string expr = ",(?:[^\"]*\"[^\"]*\")*(?![^\"]*\"))";This selects the delimiting commas in a comma separated value string and works with values enclosed inside quotes that contain commas.So this csv:foo,bar,555,"foo,bar",1,2,3Can be split into:foobar555foo,bar123Using RegEx.Split(String, expr) in .NET
author: OverTech
